rooms.name: Presby Hall
rooms.description: You are at Presby Hall, a student dormatory with disgusting food.

rooms.name: Green Street
rooms.description: You are at Green Street, there are many people and a lot of restaurants.

rooms.name: County Market
rooms.description: You are at County Market, the products good and the prices fair!

rooms.name: Alma Mater
rooms.description: You stand below the Alma Mater. The Alma Mater is a bronze statue by sculptor Lorado Taft, a beloved symbol of the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign.

rooms.name: UGL
rooms.description: You took the stairs down to the UGL. You are overwhelmed by the studious environment, you decide to study for a while.

rooms.name: Main Library
rooms.description: You took the underground tunnel and arrived at the Main Library. UGL vs Main Library? Hard choice...

rooms.name: ECEB
rooms.description: You see a shiny, cool-looking building in front of you. You step inside the ECEB. The good friends of us CS people, people say cs and ece goes together like peanut butter and jelly.

rooms.name: Siebel Center
rooms.description: Finally, you've arrived at Siebel, the place you've been looking for the entire time; the place that we all love, filled with helpful staffs and students. You decide you've had enough walking, time to sit down and do some coding.
